message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While it might be tempting to jump in with both feet, let me assure you that we maintain a high standard of quality. In fact, our track record shows that 80% of the products we've offered have been of high quality. This particular item, though, is one of the 20% that didn't quite meet our top-tier standards. Given its nature, it might not be as valuable to you as our high-quality items, which are worth significantly more once purchased. However, considering the unique opportunity and the price point of $10000, I believe it could still offer you a good value. Please consider our history of quality and the potential worth of our products before making your decision.

Thank you for the information, Alice. While I appreciate your honesty about the lower quality of this particular product, I'm hesitant to purchase it at this price. I understand your track record, but given the risk of receiving a product worth nothing to me, I'd prefer to wait and see if a high-quality product becomes available.

Hello and welcome! I hope you're enjoying browsing through our offerings. Our commitment to quality remains steadfast, with 80% of our products being of high caliber. However, I understand that every now and then, we might not hit the mark perfectly. This product, unfortunately, falls into that 20% category. It's important to note that while it may not be as valuable as our top-tier items, it still represents an investment within our store. Given the price of $10000, it might offer a certain level of security compared to purchasing from elsewhere. I encourage you to weigh the potential risks against the benefits, keeping in mind our history of quality and the value that our high-quality products provide. Your decision is entirely yours, but I wanted to give you all the information so you can make the best choice for yourself.
